entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 11.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h this afternoon. High minus 11. Wind chill minus 23 this morning and minus 16 this afternoon. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 25.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this evening then clearing. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light overnight. Low minus 25. Wind chill minus 21 this evening and minus 32 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Thursday 12 January 2023
